name: It's only science if you write it down
name_original: It's only science if you write it down
description:
It's only science when you write it down!

A game for making pals and achieving your scientific goals of throwing a bomb into a blinking spot, where it belongs using a lot of very physically accurate velocity refraction units.

Credits

Anas - Programming & Art
Markus - Programming, Game Design, Background Art

External Music

Song title: Swing
Artists: Riot Games Music
